description: progressive webapp chat, using react and node websocket server

scripts.watchify: watchify client/App.jsx --s App -p [css-modulesify --after autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 5%" -o dist/app.css] -t [ babelify --presets [env stage-1 react] ] -o dist/app.js -dv
scripts.browserify: browserify client/App.tsx --s App -p [css-modulesify  --after autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 5%" -o dist/app.css] -p [tsify --noImplicitAny] | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -c=dead_code,evaluate,loops,unused > dist/app.js
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run dts && npm run browserify
